ingredients.item: ½ savoy cabbage, quartered, tough stalks removed, shredded
30g fresh root ginger, cut into matchsticks

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan over a medium heat. Once hot, add the onion and fry, stirring often, for 5 minutes until it starts to soften and become burnished at the edges. Tip in the cabbage and mushrooms and stir-fry for 5 minutes more.

Pour in the soy sauce, mirin and vinegar along with the udon noodles. Stir well. Once the noodles are warmed through, take off the heat. Divide between 2 plates, scatter over the ginger and sprinkle with the sesame oil.
